Trade/Device Name(s): EasyScreen PCR Gastrointestinal Parasite Detection Kit
Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal Microorganism Multiplex Nucleic Acid-Based Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for EasyScreen Gastrointestinal Parasite Detection Kit, a multiplex real-time PCR assay for qualitative detection of eight gastrointestinal protozoan parasites from stool specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of pathogenic gastrointestinal parasite nucleic acid from stool of symptomatic patients, including Cryptosporidium spp., Giardia intestinalis, Dientamoeba fragilis, Entamoeba histolytica, Blastocystis hominis, Enterocytozoon bieneusi, Encephalitozoon intestinalis, and Cyclospora cayetanensis; aids in differential diagnosis of gastrointestinal infections alongside clinical assessment
